level.heading: Other prohibited acts.
level.text: A person that, in order to obtain a financial gain, intentionally falsifies, forges, conceals, defaces, or obliterates a document of gift, an amendment or revocation of a document of gift, or a refusal commits a felony and upon conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $50,000, imprisonment not exceeding 5 years, or both.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-145
level.text: For Law 17-145, see notes following ยง 7-1531.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 17 of the Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act (2006).
